title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node & browsers; works in serverless edge functions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package providing LangChain LLM, chat and embeddings interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models; runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI with readline support, conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin SDK for Ollama; Android compatible with OkHttp.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or Sinatra apps.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider with facades for chatting, streaming and pulling models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image with CUDA & ROCm variants and docker-compose examples for GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-chat-nextjs
summary: Minimal Next.js starter showing server-side streaming chat via ollama-js.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript tools provider that lets LLM agents call Ollama endpoints as functions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI-assisted note completion using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin that adds /ollama slash command for summarizing blocks or generating text.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in threads; supports slash commands and model hot-swap.
